This tool can automatically forecast <a href ="https://research.stlouisfed.org/docs/api/fred/" target="_blank">Federal Reserve Economic Data</a> via the St. Louis Federal Reserve. The tool used is the `forecast::auto.arima` feature found in R's `forecast` library. You can <a href ="https://www.jstatsoft.org/article/view/v027i03" target="_blank">read more about automatic forecasting here</a>. Thank you to Rob Hyndman for your amazing work on the `forecast` library!
